title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Tableau: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Tableau. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Tableau? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Tableau
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Tableau (analytics bi) is Tableau is a leading data visualization and business intelligence platform that enables users to connect, visualize, and share data insights through interactive dashboards and reports. Its key capabilities include drag-and-drop analytics, real-time data blending, and advanced calculations, targeting data analysts, business users, and enterprises. What makes Tableau unique is its powerful visual analytics engine, intuitive interface that requires minimal coding, and deep integration with the Salesforce ecosystem for customer-centric insights.. Users choose it for business-intelligence, data-visualization, dashboarding.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Tableau: Drag-and-drop interface for creating interactive charts, graphs, and maps, Live data connections to 80+ sources (SQL, cloud apps, spreadsheets), Tableau Prep for data cleaning, shaping, and pipeline automation

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Tableau are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Tableau for business-intelligence.
